Subject: Re: Interrogation/Clean up/Terrorcons
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron continues his work, "Before you effectively reprogam Condor
Switchbalde, I am altering his memory banks. He will think he has always
been a Decepticon". What Megatron wasnt telling everyone, was that he was
also putting in a fail safe. At the Bodicons words, he turn around done,
and retracts his slithery mechanism. "Yes I have big plans, and you five
will get to see some action, are you all fully energized?" he asked. He
then responded to the comm links, "Astroblast, refuel, we will need you
soon. Stunticons, you are all dismissed, Terrorcons, Terrorcons," Megatron
was having problems reaching them. He shut down his comm-link, and left the
room. "Worry about Condor later Switchblade, we have a world to take."
